mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.title as "title", a.hits as "hits", a.keywords as "keywords", a.image as "image", a.type as "type", a.del_flag as "delFlag", a.article_data as "articleData.id", a.create_by as "createBy.id", a.update_by as "updateBy.id", a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.category as "category.id", b.content as "articleData.content", b.allow_comment as "articleData.allowComment"
cms_article a inner join cms_article_data b on a.article_data=b.id
mapper.insert: insert into cms_article( id, title, hits, keywords, image, type, del_flag, article_data, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, category ) values( #{id}, #{title}, #{hits}, #{keywords}, #{image}, #{type}, #{delFlag}, #{articleData.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{category.id} )
